name: evelop
description:
A lone rabbit travels through its ruined home forest, hopeless and afraid, as it tries to find a moment of respite. As the player, you have the choice: to corrupt the lone rabbit, giving it horrifying new mutations at the risk of death, or to avoid the sludge of corruption to preserve its well being.

Alannah Twede - environment art
 Abigail Berg - animation
Jadon Ark - music and sfx
Duncan Fu - programming
